website_summaries.verdict: With its chunkiness inspired by two classic basketball shoes from the '80s, the Adidas Raleigh 9tis Mid will probably be appreciated by those who like a bit of a throwback style in their getups. Not only is it affordable, but it also is great looking, especially when worn as casual shoes. Although there are reports that it is narrow-fitting, many still regard its overall comfort impressive. The Adidas Raleigh 9tis Mid features a mid-top profile, a mix of leather and suede on the upper for support, and vulcanized sole.
pros: Many purchasers comment that the Adidas Raleigh 9tis Mid is a great looking and stylish shoe
It comes at an affordable price
Many also say that the quality of this shoe is great
One reviewer notes that he gets lots of compliments with this shoe on
It comes with an extra pair of laces
Some of the reviewers appreciate the retro look of this shoe
At least one reviewer likes the ankle support that this shoe provides
cons: There are several comments that the Adidas Raleigh 9tis Mid is an extremely narrow shoe, especially in the toe area
A few reviewers are disappointed that the sole of this shoe wears out fast
Some users comment that this shoe does not have much cushion

customer_reviews.title: Great fashion sneakers. Look very hot but lacks cushioning aND arch support.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say these run small, but they fit snug. It's like slim fit sneakers. If u don't like tight sneakers order half up. These shoes offer almost no cushioning or arch support but however I'm always the guy who chooses fashion over comfort, these shoes look freaking great both in jeans or shorts. These navy color ones goes especially well with dark wash slim jeans. As for the cushioning, I would recommend against playing sports in these as you might developed knee and hip problems from no cushioning. The shoes feel like old school tennis shoes with a thick flat rubber bottom, this problem can be solved however, by buying separate insoles.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Transaction

customer_reviews.title: Bad, Very Bad!
customer_reviews.text: I love Adidas, and purchased these for no other reason than to be a fashion accessory with my adidas Trio pants of the same color pattern. Alas, these shoes were so dreadfully bad that I literally did need to even try them on to know they were going back. I did end up trying them on which only further hastened the process of printing the return to sender label. Cheap material and offensive looking to anyone with a modicum of good taste. Bad, very bad!
customer_reviews.author: TidesManian Devil

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sizing
customer_reviews.text: I always wear a size 12US normal width for both boots and sneakers - the sizing on these are ridiculous. All I can say is these don't follow normal sizing. I bought 12 like the chart said and they felt like children's shoes. My toe was flat against the tip of the shoe and worst of all they were roughly half the width of normal shoes - they hurt to wear. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B.

customer_reviews.title: Who are these shoes made for - elves?
customer_reviews.text: Who are these shoes made for - elves? When someone has a size 12 foot, they are NOT likely to have narrow feet? VERY disappointed, sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Karl T.

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, too small... order larger size than your normal
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes in a different color about a year ago and I wanted to get these ones I bought them in the exact same size of the same exact name shoe the exception the ones I have are black and blue instead of grey and white. So when they arrived I couldn't even put my foot inside the shoe and I wear a 12. So I would say if you want these shoes maybe order a size or so above the normal size you order because these are extremely tight and they don't offer a 13 on Amazon for these shoes at least not when I wrote this review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get at least half a size bigger.
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe, but it looks cooler in the picture. I normally wear a 7.5, but the only size available was an 8 and it fits perfectly. The insole is a bit flat, but it is still comfortable. I love ADIDAS and will keep these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: A&P

customer_reviews.title: Go Adidas!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a Women's size 11, I bought a Men's size 10 and they fit well. The struggle is real to find cute, good quality shoes, especially hi-tops. I think men's shoes are made to be a little bulkier than women's, but other than that, they look nice for my hip hop classes and they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Ripped within 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a normal adidas 10.5 maybe slightly tighter in the toe area. Almost completely flat arch support as they are flat bottom shoes. Fairly cheaply made in terms of adidas. Mine ripped after about 5-6 times wearing them as you can see in the pic they’re very clean and well taken care of and still ripped

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look good and feel good on my feet. 👌👍

customer_reviews.title: Love the style, but very narrow.
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite pair of shoes as far as how they look. However, I have other Adidas shoes in men's size 8.5, ordered a size 9 in these, as suggested in other reviews, and they are still very narrow compared to my other Adidas shoes. I stretched them and that helped, but I probably should've ordered a 9.5.

customer_reviews.text: These Adidas are a great looking classic high top. Sizing was very accurate for me; shoes are narrower then other Adidas, but this suits my foot well. I've been using mine for the gym and love the flat sole for squats. Shoes have held up very well over the six months of using them.

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are my favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I literally have 3 pairs of these, they're that great. Unfortunately, they're insanely hard to find because Adidas discontinued them. These shoes fit very well on me for someone who has narrow feet, but they really don't have any arch support. It's not bothersome to me, but for those who need it, you might need inserts. These shoes are a little hard to clean, but it's okay

customer_reviews.text: Came in very quick and a great buy for the price. These shoes are exactly what i wanted. They were slightly smaller than i expected and will require a little breaking in but i am overall very happy with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Bought two pairs.

I recommend going one size up. Also, These hold up nicely. We purchased our first pair back in Feb 2017 and they still look new! Just purchased another pair Nov 2017.

Considering he not only wears them out and about but he also uses them while playing basketball, I think they have held up pretty well. We will probably purchase again.

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Raleigh 9Tis Mid High-Top Basketball Shoe
product_meta.description: When it comes to finding the right pair of men's athletic shoes, you just can't beat quality design. While there may be many different types of shoes to choose from, a great pair of running shoes is specifically designed for just that, running. Design is how Adidas shoes distinguish themselves above the rest. While most people think shoe design only affects the comfort of your feet, in reality, shoe design can affect your whole body. Adidas shoes were meticulously crafted with this in mind. Adidas shoes feature a rubber sole able to effortlessly provide the traction needed to keep you moving forward at full speed while also supplying the flexibility to enable you to move naturally. Additionally, this stylish footwear is constructed with a synthetic fabric able to absorb any excess moisture while creating a light-weight, breathable atmosphere for your feet. The fusion of form and function in Adidas shoes makes them the best athletic shoes for those seeking to unleash their natural potential on the track. Slip on a pair of Adidas shoes and experience the superior comfort and support that Adidas shoes were designed to provide.
feature_bullets: Coated leather upper is soft and durable
Hook-and-loop ankle strap helps lock down the fit
